Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.tigerencryption.otpgenerator

Class EncryptedMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.tigerencryption.otpgenerator.EncryptedMessage
  • public class EncryptedMessage
extends Object
    This class represents an encrypted message in form of a map. Every entry consists of an index to indicate the otp-chunk that has been used for encryption as well as the resulting byte array for he corresponding chunk.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EncryptedMessage​(OneTimePad pad, int startChunkIndex, byte[][] chops)
      Constructor for creation of an encrypted message bundle.

      Returns an int[] with the exact chunk Ids used for encryption.
      int getFollowUpChunkIndex()
      Helper method to tell which chunk id should be used as startChunkId for the next message encryption call to the cryptor class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EncryptedMessage

        public EncryptedMessage​(OneTimePad pad,
                        int startChunkIndex,
                        byte[][] chops)
        Constructor for creation of an encrypted message bundle.
        Parameters:
        pad - as the pad that was used for encryption.
        startChunkIndex - as the first chunk id that was used for encryption.
        chops - as the actual encrypted message as 2D byte array.

    • Method Detail

      • getOtpHash

        public String getOtpHash()
        Helper method to look up hash of the one time pad associated to this encrypted message.
        Returns:
        the one time pad hash registered for this encrypted message.

      • getPrefix

        public String getPrefix​(int chunkId,
                        int chunkPadding)
        Helper method that creates a quasi unique prefix telling the hash of one time pad used and intern chunk used for encryption.
        Parameters:
        chunkId - as the number of the chunk used for encryption.
        chunkPadding - as the target length for padding the number with leading zeroes.
        Returns:
        a prefix string that can concatenated with representation of an encrypted message chop.

      • getChopAmount

        public int getChopAmount()
        Public access method to retrieve the amount of chops this encrypted message consists of.
        Returns:
        length of the internal data structure, storing all chops.

      • getChunksUsed

        public int[] getChunksUsed()
        Returns an int[] with the exact chunk Ids used for encryption.
        Returns:
        the chunk ids used for encryption.

      • getChop

        public byte[] getChop​(int chopIndex)
        Public access methof to retireve a copy of the byte array representing a singe encrypted message chop.
        Parameters:
        chopIndex - as the index of the mssage chop to receive.
        Returns:
        a copy of the requested byte array.

      • serializeToHex

        public String serializeToHex()
        Utils method that serializes an encrypted to a printable string, conaining only ASCII characters. The outcome can be safely transmitted over insecure channels.
        Returns:
        ascii serialized version of encrypted message.

      • getFollowUpChunkIndex

        public int getFollowUpChunkIndex()
        Helper method to tell which chunk id should be used as startChunkId for the next message encryption call to the cryptor class.
        Returns:
        next chunk id to use for encryption.
